ARABIC: لَّا تَرَىٰ فِيهَا عِوَجًا وَلَآ أَمْتًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: on which you will see no dip or gradient.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Over which you will see no curves or elevations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: in which you shall find no crookedness or curvature.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: that you will see no depression or elevation in it".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “In which you shall neither see ups nor downs.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: You will see therein no crookedness nor curve."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: You shall not see therein any crookedness or unevenness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: wherein thou wilt see no crookedness neither any curving.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Wherein thou seest neither curve nor ruggedness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: with neither hollows nor upthrust mounds to be seen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherein thou shalt not see any crookedness or ruggedness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: You will not see any crookedness or unevenness in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nothing crooked or curved wilt thou see in their place."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: You will see therein nothing crooked or curved."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: with neither crookedness nor any curving to be seen therein'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: You will see in them neither crookedness, nor deviation.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: You will not see therein a depression or an elevation."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:107] wherein you will see neither crookedness, [neither] slope, nor any curving’, [nor] any rise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Wherein thou seest neither curve) valleys or cleaves (nor ruggedness) nor plants or anything sprouting out of the earth.
